title: Stones River National Battlefield: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons         Photo by Volunteer Buddy Secor  Open to the Public: Park: Sunrise to Sunset Tour Road, McFadden Farm & Redoubt Brannan: 8 AM to 5 PM Visitor Center: 8 AM to 5 PM Fortress Rosecrans: Sunrise to Sunset Visitors may park at Tour Stop #5 or the visitor center parking lot when accessing the park between 5 PM and sunset. Bicyclists and pedestrians may also enter park areas using the Stones River Greenway. Closed: Thanksgiving & December 25th  Â   Getting Around  Allow about two hours to see the museum and take the self-guiding tour of the battlefield. If you wish to visit other sites such as Fortress Rosecrans, allow more time.
